DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to compare the percentage of subjects who reach the target HbA1c level (< or = 7.0% at endpoint) and do not experience symptomatic nocturnal hypoglycemia during treatment with insulin glargine or NPH human insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Insulin Glargine in Insulin Naïve Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes on Oral Hypoglycemic Agent(s)
DOC.criteria: Insulin naïve subjects with type 2 diabetes treated with oral hypoglycemic agents Body mass index between 26 and 40 kg/m2 HbA1c between 7.5% and 10.0% Fasting plasma glucose >7.8 mmol/L and fasting Cpeptide > or =0.25 nmol/L
